Posted By: Arthindole (3/15/2010 10:53:01 AM)

posts.post_content: Yeah, this will hit multikicker. If you look at the Oracle text for this card, it reads 'if it was kicked', which is the same wording that is used on multikicker cards (see [Apex Hawks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Apex Hawks): "for each time it was kicked").

Posted By: Tynansdtm (10/18/2012 10:56:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: @Atogatogatog: A card is only a spell if it is on the stack. As the stack is not a physical place, you cannot put a card from the hand onto the stack except by casting it or from the effect of another spell or ability. Causing a playing to drop their card will not work. It will just make everyone think you're a jerk.
posts.html:
@Atogatogatog: A card is only a spell if it is on the stack. As the stack is not a physical place, you cannot put a card from the hand onto the stack except by casting it or from the effect of another spell or ability.
